02 : Projects

Following projects had been completed both in group and individual basis. The projects such as 'LamboShop' and 'Tempo of TypeScript' were group projects, while 'Chatbot' was a Stackathon individual work.

View Resume

E-commerce

LamboShop

E-commerce store where visitors can browse through limited-edition Lamborghini vehicles and make a purchase via guest checkout or by signing up with a new account.

Discover

Machine Learning

Chatbot

Simple customer-service chatbot designed to assist clients with their cell phone carrier needs such as purchasing prepaid plan, request sim unlock for their device, and online bill payment.

Discover

Web Game

Tempo of TypeScript

2D Dungeon crawl and survival-based web game in which a player should destroy all the enemies and survive the map. The movements of a player and aggression level of enemies depends on the beats per minute of songs selected before launching the game.
